help.title: User Manual
help.subtitle: Laptop Anti-theft & Remote Monitoring App
help.appIntroContent: MeerCOP is a real-time monitoring app to prevent theft and unauthorized use of your laptop. When monitoring is turned on from your smartphone, any movement, touch, or lid opening detected on the laptop triggers an immediate alarm with photos, location, and live streaming.
help.gettingStartedContent:
1. Install the **MeerCOP app** on your smartphone and sign up.
2. Open the **MeerCOP web app** on your laptop browser and enter the **serial number** found in the smartphone app's settings.
3. Enter a device name and tap **Connect** to pair your smartphone and laptop.
4. Press the **Monitor ON** button in the smartphone app to start monitoring.
help.mainScreenContent:
The main screen displays the **MeerCOP mascot** showing the current status.

‚Ä¢ **Top icons**: Smartphone connection, network, camera, and settings icons
‚Ä¢ **Center**: Monitoring status message (Monitoring / Idle)
‚Ä¢ **Bottom**: Notification panel to view recent events.
help.monitoringContent:
Monitoring can only be started/stopped from the **smartphone app**.

‚Ä¢ When monitoring is on, all **detection sensors** (camera, keyboard, mouse, USB, lid, etc.) on the laptop are activated.
‚Ä¢ If an anomaly is detected, an **alarm** sounds immediately and a **notification** is sent to the smartphone.
‚Ä¢ Alarms can be dismissed from the smartphone app or by entering a **PIN** on the laptop.
help.liveCameraContent:
View the laptop's **webcam live stream** from your smartphone.

‚Ä¢ Low-latency streaming powered by **WebRTC** technology.
‚Ä¢ When an alert is triggered, a **snapshot** is automatically captured and sent to the smartphone.
‚Ä¢ You can also open the camera directly on the laptop to take and save snapshots.
help.locationContent:
View the smartphone's **GPS location** on the laptop screen.

‚Ä¢ **GPS-based**: Most accurate location (within meters)
‚Ä¢ **Wi-Fi-based**: Estimated location (within hundreds of meters to kilometers)
‚Ä¢ **IP-based**: Approximate location (several kilometers margin)
‚Ä¢ Location is displayed on a map with the address shown.
help.networkInfoContent:
Check the laptop's **network status**.

‚Ä¢ Connection status (Online/Offline)
‚Ä¢ IP address, connection type (Wi-Fi, Ethernet, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Speed, latency (RTT), effective connection grade
‚Ä¢ Based on the browser's Network Information API.
help.settingsContent:
Manage various laptop app settings.

‚Ä¢ **Device type**: Select Laptop / Desktop / Tablet
‚Ä¢ **Alarm sound**: 10 built-in alarm sounds or upload your own
‚Ä¢ **Volume**: Adjust alarm volume
‚Ä¢ **Detection sensors**: Camera motion, lid, keyboard, mouse, USB, power, etc. (managed from smartphone)
‚Ä¢ **Language**: Multi-language support (changed from smartphone)
help.deviceManagementContent:
Register and manage **multiple laptops/computers** with a single serial number.

‚Ä¢ Set individual names and types for each device.
‚Ä¢ View the status of all registered devices at a glance from the smartphone app.
‚Ä¢ Device names can be changed directly on the laptop.
help.alertsNotificationsContent:
When an anomaly is detected during monitoring:

‚Ä¢ **Alarm sound**: The selected alarm plays at maximum volume on the laptop.
‚Ä¢ **Smartphone notification**: A push notification is sent with the detection type.
‚Ä¢ **Auto snapshot**: Automatically captured if a webcam is connected.
‚Ä¢ **Dismiss alarm**: Dismiss via the smartphone app or by entering a PIN on the laptop.
help.camouflageModeContent:
When camouflage mode is enabled, the laptop screen looks like a **normal webpage**.

‚Ä¢ Even while monitoring is active, MeerCOP is not visible on screen.
‚Ä¢ When an alert occurs, notifications are sent to the smartphone in the background without any screen changes.
‚Ä¢ A thief opening the laptop cannot tell that a monitoring app is running.
help.stealRecoveryContent:
Even after the laptop is stolen, **location tracking and evidence collection** remain possible.

‚Ä¢ Activate **Theft Recovery Mode** from the smartphone and the laptop will automatically transmit location and photos.
‚Ä¢ Even more effective when combined with camouflage mode.
‚Ä¢ Collected information can be used as evidence when filing a police report.
